AvroDeserializer¶

class AvroDeserializer.AvroDeserializer(schema)¶

Bases: object

Decodes the given schema for the user and returns the decoded data. Wrapper for the AvroDeserializer.

schema¶

the schema loaded from a schema file

Type

Schema
